main event: A white light was observed moving in the sky by multiple witnesses in Burlington, Vermont on June 24, 1954.
interesting points: The sighting lasted for 23 minutes,The light appeared to move like a star but with unusual movement,Two to three similar objects were seen in the same area,The objects disappeared into clouds after being observed,The witnesses described the object as moving at speeds approaching those of jet aircraft.
sighted object: a white light in the sky
witness description: Reliable and honest citizens including a farmer and a state police dispatcher.
